dynaForm.name: text
dynaForm.PME_VALIDATE_NAME: SELECT XMLNODE_NAME, TYPE FROM dynaForm WHERE XMLNODE_NAME = @@PME_XMLNODE_NAME
dynaForm.PME_DEPENDENTFIELDS: select XMLNODE_NAME, XMLNODE_NAME AS NAME FROM dynaForm WHERE XMLNODE_NAME <> @@PME_XMLNODE_NAME AND XMLNODE_NAME <> "" AND ( TYPE="text" or TYPE="textarea" or TYPE="dropdown" or TYPE="listbox" or TYPE="hidden" or TYPE="suggest") Dependent Fields(none)

PME_SAVELABEL.en: Save selected option as Value Label

PME_CALLBACK.en: Javascript callback to execute by a selection
